Control.ttp: xxThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
xxThe username used for logging into the PAC.
xxWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
xxThe password used for logging into the PAC.
xxThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
xxWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
xxDate and time this user was first added to the database.
xxDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
xxLevel of access granted to this user.
xxClick to display online help related to this page...
xxClick to begin adding a new user...
xxClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
xxClick to save the current user information to the database...
xxClick to refresh the contents of this page...
xxClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
xxClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
xxThe username used for logging into the PAC
xxIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
xxThe date and time the user was added to the database.
xxThe date and time of the last modification.
xxIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
xxThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
xxThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: xxPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
xxNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
xxUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
